DrugName: Oxycodone (or alternative opioid for severe pain)
Muscle relaxants like Cyclobenzaprine or Methocarbamol (if muscle spasm is present)
Pain medications like Acetaminophen or Aspirin
Topical NSAIDs like Diclofenac or Ketoprofen (for skin protection and pain relief on the left chest and thoracic spine)
Bupropion, Escitalopram, Quetiapine, and Levotirixine are to be continued as per original prescription
